channel.title: Git page on Bud
channel.description: Recent content in Git page on Bud

item.title: Simply publishing hugo blog onto git page
item.description: Problem # While trying to deploy on git repository within a simple command, hugo has occured an error before building its result. ERROR 2021/04/05 19:35:35 mkdir /docs: read-only file system Situation # added publishDir : /docs as far as git-pages requires the /docs folder to deploy. Automatically wished to my docs folder deployed through git push master master. However, hugo commands got a stuck with it. How did I solve # removed publishDir : /docs in config.
